Paragraph: The HOMO and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) energy levels of the resulting polymers , PBT and PTT , were substantially stabilized when compared to those of the parent P3HT.

Let's think step by step.

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels of the resulting polymers (PBT and PTT) |
| LUMO energy levels of the resulting polymers (PBT and PTT) |
| HOMO energy levels of the parent P3HT |
| LUMO energy levels of the parent P3HT |

| --- |

| LUMO energy levels of the resulting polymers (PBT and PTT) |

| LUMO energy levels of the parent polymer (P3HT) |

Note: In this case, "resulting polymers" and "parent polymer" can be considered as context that helps identify the material properties mentioned in the paragraph.
